summary: The Caucasus is a unique area between Europe and Asia, with mountains that separate the two continents. It includes countries like Armenia, Azerbaijan, and Georgia, and parts of Russia. The region is known for its tall mountains, like Mount Elbrus, the highest peak in Europe. It is divided into North and South Caucasus, with different countries and cultures in each part. Many different languages are spoken here, making it a very diverse place. The Caucasus is special because it has its own distinct languages and landscapes.
title: Caucasus
